text: Greyhound Lines (commonly called Greyhound) is a company in the United States that runs bus services between cities. It was founded in 1914. Its parent company is on the London Stock Exchange. The buses use air brakes and hold over 200 gallons of diesel. Category:American transport companies Category:1914 establishments in the United States Category:Bus transport in the United States Category:Companies based in Dallas
title: Greyhound Lines
